briefdescription.para: Return the kind of this pending update.
Set a callback to delete files instead of the table's default.

parameterdescription.para: A function used to delete file locations

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining
Cannot be called more than once

briefdescription.para: Stage a snapshot in table metadata, but not update the current snapshot id.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining
Reference to this for method chaining

briefdescription.para: Apply the update's changes to create a new snapshot.

detaileddescription.para: This method validates the changes, applies them to the metadata, and creates a new snapshot without committing it. The snapshot is stored internally and can be accessed after Apply() succeeds.

simplesect.para: A result containing the new snapshot, or an error

briefdescription.para: Finalize the snapshot update, cleaning up any uncommitted files.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::span< const std::shared_ptr< DataFile > > files, const std::shared_ptr< PartitionSpec > &spec, std::optional< int64_t > data_sequence_number=std::nullopt)
memberdef.name: WriteDataManifests

briefdescription.para: Write data manifests for the given data files.

parameterdescription.para: Optional data sequence number for the files

memberdef.argsstring: (std::span< const std::shared_ptr< DataFile > > files, const std::shared_ptr< PartitionSpec > &spec)
memberdef.name: WriteDeleteManifests

briefdescription.para: Write delete manifests for the given delete files.
Clean up any uncommitted manifests that were created.

detaileddescription.para: Manifests may not be committed if Apply is called multiple times because a commit conflict has occurred. Implementations may keep around manifests because the same changes will be made by both Apply calls. This method instructs the implementation to clean up those manifests and passes the paths of the manifests that were actually committed.

parameterdescription.para: A set of manifest paths that were actually committed

briefdescription.para: A string that describes the action that produced the new snapshot.

detaileddescription.para: Child operations can override this to add custom validation.

parameterdescription.para: Ending snapshot on the lineage which is being validated

briefdescription.para: Apply the update's changes to the given metadata and snapshot.

parameterdescription.para: The base table metadata to apply changes to
Snapshot to apply the changes to

simplesect.para: A vector of manifest files for the new snapshot

briefdescription.para: Get the summary map for this operation.
Check if cleanup should happen after commit.

simplesect.para: True if cleanup should happen after commit

briefdescription.para: Get or generate the snapshot ID for the new snapshot.
Delete a file at the given path.

parameterdescription.para: The path of the file to delete

simplesect.para: A status indicating the result of the deletion

briefdescription.para: Returns the snapshot summary from the implementation and updates totals.
Base class for operations that produce snapshots.

detaileddescription.para: This class provides common functionality for creating new snapshots, including manifest list writing and cleanup.
